title: Asian Development Bank Funded National Highways Sector Project - Approval for Variation to the  Contract for Consultancy  Services for Construction Supervision of Civil Works Contracts
decision_details:
- the following roads have been included for rehabilitation under the above project:

*  	Puttalam - Anuradhapura Road
*  	Udatenna - Mahiyangana Road
*  	Nuwara Eliya - Badulla Road
*  	Habarana  - Kanta
The proposal made by H.E. the President, in his capacity as the Minister of  Ports and Highways to issue a variation order for consultancy services, to extend the period of the Consultancy Services Contract from 2012?02?01 to 2015?01?31, and to revise the contract price of the said services to US$ 4,604,526.46 and LKR 860,151,997.09, was approved by the Government.
